org.fhaes.feedback

Class FeedbackMessagePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.fhaes.feedback.FeedbackMessagePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class FeedbackMessagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    FeedbackMessagePanel Class. This class contains all GUI components and logic pertaining to the communication of informative messages between the FHAES software and the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • stopShowingCurrentMessage

        public void stopShowingCurrentMessage()
        Prevents the FeedbackMessagePanel from showing the current message in the future. This action is permanent until the 'reset all feedback message preferences' button is pressed on the MainWindow.
